meanings.definition: A proposition supporting or helping to support a conclusion.
meanings.sent1: The premised of the argument was crucial in reaching a decision.

meanings.definition: A statement or idea that forms the basis for a work or theory.
meanings.sent1: The premised of the novel set the tone for the entire book.
